title: Workshop on Mathematics-Based Learn-by-Doing (LBD) Pedagogy for Engineering Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic engineering mathematics and job-related problem-solving
context.additional_context: Workplace mathematics competency enhancement program for employees conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can convert real-world engineering problems into mathematical models and propose solutions with 80% accuracy.
Learners apply three or more 21st-century competencies (collaboration, critical thinking) while performing team projects in LBD (Learning by Doing) format.
Learners complete data analysis projects using mobile-accessible digital tools (apps/webs).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
